name: SAMIKHYA CHARITABLE SOCIETY
briefDescription: Samikhya Charitable Society is started on 16th August 2008 by a group of young Garduates with an intention to support poor and meritorious students with Scholarship towards School/College fees.In the year 2008 we categorised our regions of work to:1. Vidhya. 2. Vydhya3. Aarogya  Also came forward with VIDHYA BHAVISHYA NIDHI way back in 2013 with a promise to create a mechanism which could cater the government school children with enough note books for their academic year every year.Iniated "Project Sunayana " under which eye checkup and glasses are distributed to the students of Govt Schools every year with the association of Nayana Eye Care Hospitals.Started Haritha Project under which planted in the local areas.
